message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I think would be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you at a special price of $12,000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $9,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $11,000? This would still give you a great deal, and allow me to make a fair profit. Let me know what you think!
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $11,000 is a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers.  How about $11,750? It's a fair compromise, and still a good deal for both of us.  Let's see if we can finalize this!
